summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Skillax Digital Marketing Academy website. All core functionality working perfectly including backend APIs, frontend UI, admin portal, and integrations.

integration_issues.issue: Success message not clearly visible after form submission

passed_tests: All 15 backend API endpoints working (100% success rate)
Homepage loads with hero section, stats, courses, testimonials
Navigation works - all pages load (Home, About, Courses, Certifications, Blog, Contact)
Contact form submission works with backend integration
AI Chatbot opens, sends/receives messages successfully
WhatsApp button has correct link and is clickable
Course detail pages load with working accordion curriculum
Admin login works with correct credentials (admin@skillax.in / SkillaxAdmin2024!)
Admin dashboard shows leads, analytics, and all navigation tabs work
Lead form integration with backend working
All course cards clickable and navigate properly
